coded_answer.p: Firstly, I'm very glad to hear from you. Thank you for being organisedorganising the programme for our class,. We have seen your programme, and like all of those , especially the Science Museum, it. It will be good for us to increase our knowledge, and so on.

Secondly, I wonder if you know it will havethat the "London fashion and Leisure Show" bewill be showedheld on Tuesday inat the Central Exhibition Hall. In other words, what they will introduce, is mostvery interested ininteresting to us,. I mean it's conflict with your plan, what. What a pity!

All of us want to go to the show, the. The generation who are the same agoage withas us all like make upmake-up, become beautiful, and it's important that it will be free for students and just be showed for one day. So, we don't want loseto loseto miss this chance.

Finally, we would like to get your permitionpermission to go, maybe. Maybe if it is possible that you can change your programme, we maycan be goinggo to your college any time after Tuesday. We're sorry to givecause you trouble.
We look forward to hearing from you again as soon as possible.
It was dangerous, but I knew I had to do it.

This story happedhappened two years ago. That was a very hot summer, everyall the. All the people in our city likeliked to swim in the river, perhaps. Perhaps they didn't think it was interesting if they swimedswam in the pool. Personally, I'd like to say I was good at swimming. Not only I waswas I a member of the swimming team in our school, but also I washad been toughttaught by my father since I was five years old,. So I would understoodacquiredhad acquired some skills and learned how to protect yourselfmyself from my Dad, if you had aan accident.

One day, I passed by a river in accident,. I saw there were a lot of people playing in the river. Suddenly, I heard a cry of "helpHelp, help" in mythe distance.
